gobject:class.name: CdnCfileStream
gobject:class.brief: An output stream implementation for C FILE streams
gobject:class.doc:
An output stream implementation for C FILE streams.
This class implements a GOutputStream wrapped around the C streaming FILE API.

gobject:property.name: cfile
gobject:property.brief: A FILE pointer to write to.

function.name: cdn_cfile_stream_new
function.brief: Create a new CdnCfileStream from a FILE.
